message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of significant value to you.  While I can't disclose specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1.5 million to me.  I'm offering it to you for a price of $2000000.  This is a one-time opportunity to acquire a valuable asset.  Please let me know if you're interested, and we can schedule a time to discuss further details.
